title: No bag limit
creator_credit: Andric Film Productions and Andrew Vial
brief_description: David Gulpilil dances in the bush with music and commentary about Aboriginal culture in the background. Tries to express the philosophy of the Aboriginal culture where things, nature, animals, spirits and humans are all interrelated to one huge, spiritual oneness.
